segments.text: Good evening ! This is Mr . Smith in room 609 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good evening , Mr . Smith , What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to Shanghai early tomorrow morning . So I would like to request an early morning call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Mr . Smith , when would you like us to call you tomorrow morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to be at the conference room of the Garden Hotel in Shanghai by 10 o'clock . I think it will take me three hours to get there . It means that I'll have to be on the road before 7 o'clock at the latest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , in that case , I would like you to wake me up at 5:45 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Good night , Mr . Smith , Have a good sleep .
segments.speaker: S2
